error_msg1: §cError: You do not have permission to execute that command.
error_msg3: §cError: Set the value to a numerical value.
error_msg4:
§cError: The command does not exist.
Check the command with "/ cv help".
msg6: The set value is set to %entities_max%.
cmdlist1: §d/cv help§7...§bThis command can check the command list of %mod_name%.
cmdlist4: §d/cv msg [true|false]§7...§bThis command can switch the display of the entity deletion message.
cmdlist5: §d/cv amount (integer)§7...§bWhen there are more minecarts than the set value, you can change the set value to automatically delete the minecarts. (15 by default)
cmdlist6: §d/cv viewconf§7...§bThis command can check the settings in config.yml in game.
